name: Eye of the Storm (itch)
description:
A game made for Week 182 of the weekly game jam - and my first project that I've bothered to see through enough to upload. This week's theme was 'Cthulu', hence the (hastely drawn)  giant eyeball in the background.

The goal of the game is to simply survive. You get 4 hits, after that you lose and can start again. also you have a cannon to defend yourself.

One of my first works so it's incredibly crude what with the self-drawn art and no music. I actually had some other features in the works but alas the deadline happened. In future I've got to figure out a way to be more efficient with my dev time - like to have a more specific todo list or something. Well anyway, enjoy.
